author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Can you add some compatibility constraints on your dependencies and Julia?
Yes sure! I am new in julia (this is the first package I register). Can you provide a link on how to add the dependency constraints? Thanks in advance!

Welcome to Julia! Here are some notes about compatibility constraints: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/compatibility/ In your case I think that this would work great:
```toml
[compat]
WriteVTK = "1"
julia = "1"
```

When you have added this you can just retrigger the bot and this PR will be updated.
